result.execSummary:
The defendant Travis Miles Bruemmer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Travis Miles Bruemmer is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Travis Miles Bruemmer was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater, Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Public Defender appointment

Defendant Travis Miles Bruemmer in court with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Linda A. Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court. finds Defendant guilty.  Court withholds sentence.

Count 3:
2 years Probation

$543.00 C/C ($243.00 c/c + $100.00 Dom. Abuse + $200.00 DNAAS)  & Supervision Fees (PAID THRU PROBATION)

Cover Letter from Atty. Klopp

Defendant Travis Miles Bruemmer in court with attorney Roger L Klopp.  Defendant Travis Miles Bruemmer in custody.  Linda A Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case and appearances stated. This is a motion to modify bond. Atty Klopp addresses court as to the request to modify bond. DE could begin domestic abuse classes tomorrow if court is willing to modify bond and have DE be released. Atty Hoffman responds. Atty Klopp replies. Court modifies cash bond to $500.00. Court states if cash bond isn't posted court allows furlough for AODA and DA classes subject to all bond conditions.
